body_html:
Any update on this? The protobuf git submodule seems to have been removed sometime before v0.7.1 was tagged, but the new external repo doesn't appaear to be there yet.

Fresh pull:

$ git clone https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow.git
$ cd tensorflow
$ git checkout v0.7.1
$ ./configure
$ bazel build -c opt --config=cuda --verbose_failures //tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer
.......
ERROR: /share/sw/admin/sources/t/tensorflow/tensorflow/cc/BUILD:63:1: error loading package 'tensorflow/core': Extension file not found. Unable to load package for '//google/protobuf:protobuf.bzl': BUILD file not found on package path and referenced by '//tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer'.
ERROR: Loading failed; build aborted.
INFO: Elapsed time: 1.988s

What's the current way of compiling Tensorflow from source?

body:
Any update on this? The protobuf git submodule seems to have been removed sometime before v0.7.1 was tagged, but the new external repo doesn't appaear to be there yet.

Fresh pull:

```
$ git clone https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow.git
$ cd tensorflow
$ git checkout v0.7.1
$ ./configure
$ bazel build -c opt --config=cuda --verbose_failures //tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer
.......
ERROR: /share/sw/admin/sources/t/tensorflow/tensorflow/cc/BUILD:63:1: error loading package 'tensorflow/core': Extension file not found. Unable to load package for '//google/protobuf:protobuf.bzl': BUILD file not found on package path and referenced by '//tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer'.
ERROR: Loading failed; build aborted.
INFO: Elapsed time: 1.988s
```

What's the current way of compiling Tensorflow from source?
